title: Runtimes
description: Runtimes are environments that execute code written in a particular programming language. They provide the necessary infrastructure to run and manage applications.

items.title: Node.js
items.description: Node.js is a popular JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. It allows developers to run JavaScript code server-side, enabling scalable and efficient web applications.

items.title: Deno
items.description: Deno is a secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript, built with modern features and security in mind. It provides a secure runtime environment with built-in support for TypeScript.

items.title: Bun
items.description: Bun is a lightweight and efficient JavaScript runtime designed for modern web development. It offers a minimalistic approach with fast startup times and low memory overhead.
